Key:
Ah. Maybe I ate too much. Rinne's food is just
so delicious that I can't help overeating.
Translation:
Ah. Tal vez comí demasiado. La comida de Rinne es
Tan deliciosa que no puedo evitar comer en exceso.

Key: Hm? Yes...?
Shido, are you here?
Yeah, but... what's up?
I was going to take a bath, but we're out of shampoo.
Translation: Iba a darme un baño, pero no tenemos champú.

Key: Oh, we were running low, weren't we?

So you already noticed and didn't do anything
about it? Ugh.
Translation:
¿Así que ya te has dado cuenta y no has hecho
Nada al respecto? Uf.

Key: S-Sorry, I just forgot.

Sorry won't fix it. Go to the store and get some right
now if you're really sorry. You wouldn't dare say
no, would you?
Translation:
Sentirlo no lo arreglará. Ve a la tienda y compra un
poco ahora mismo si de verdad lo sientes.
No te atreverías a decir que no, ¿verdad?

Key: Okay, okay. I'll go buy it.
You better hurry or I'll... I'll do something!
Translation: Será mejor que te des prisa o... ¡Haré algo!

Key: I get it! Just hold on.
Hmph...
Ugh. Kotori's so bossy...
Hm?
Oh, hi, Shido-san. Good evening.
O-Oh. What are you doing out this late?
Sometimes, the night is just more convenient...
Translation: A veces, la noche es más conveniente...

Key: Uh... what are you doing?
Hehe. That's a secret.
I see. I guess I won't ask anymore then.
Translation: Ya veo. Supongo que no preguntaré más entonces.

Key:
Oh? You're not curious? I mean...
what if I happen to be eating people?
Translation:
¿Oh? ¿No tienes curiosidad? Quiero decir…
¿y si resulta que me estoy comiendo a la gente?

Key: You aren't though... are you?
Eh? Why would you assume that?

Well, you said you didn't plan on it.
At least for right now, anyway.
Translation:
Bueno, dijiste que no lo planeabas.
Al menos por ahora.

Key: Heh. Yes, I mentioned something like that.

I will leave it to your imagination to guess what
I was doing. Now then... good night, Shido-san.
Translation:
Dejaré a su imaginación adivinar lo que estaba haciendo.
Ahora bien... buenas noches, Shido-san.

Key: She's always saying the most suggestive things.
Translation: Siempre está diciendo las cosas más sugerentes.

Key: I better let Kotori know that I saw Kurumi lurking around.
Translation:
Será mejor que avise a Kotori de que he visto
A Kurumi merodeando.

Key: I'll tell Kotori as soon as I get home.
Translation: Se lo diré a Kotori en cuanto llegue a casa.

Key: I'm home. I bought the shampoo, Kotori!
Translation: Estoy en casa. ¡Compré el champú, Kotori!

Key:
Did everyone fall asleep? Well, whatever.
I'll take a bath while I still can.
Translation:
¿Se durmieron todos? Bueno, da igual.
Me daré un baño mientras pueda.

Key:
Now that we have more people living with us,
we're always fighting for the bathroom. I gotta
take advantage of this while I can.
Translation:
Ahora que hay más gente viviendo con nosotros,
siempre nos estamos peleando por el baño.
Tengo que aprovechar mientras pueda.

Key: Oh? Someone left the light on?
What?
Shi...do?
K-Kotori...? What are you...?
What? Why are you in a daze?
Oh. Uh... u-uh... I just bought some shampoo...
Translation: Oh. Uh ... u-uh ... Acabo de comprar un poco de champú ...

Key: You idiot! You idiot brother!
S-Sorry! It wasn't on purpose!
You ready?
W-Wait. Can we talk about...
Ugh. You're hopeless.

I-I said I'm sorry. We used to bathe together
back in the day. What's the big deal?
Translation:
Dije que lo siento.
Solíamos bañarnos juntos hace tiempo.
¿Cuál es el problema?

Key: Did you say something?

Nothing, nothing at all!
I want to tell you something.
Translation: ¡Nada, nada de nada!  Quiero decirte algo.

Key: Are you trying to change the subject?
No, when I went to get shampoo, I saw Kurumi.
Translation: No, cuando fui a por champú, vi a Kurumi.

Key:
What?! You saw Kurumi?!
Are you okay? Did she do something?
No, we just talked a little.

I see. Kurumi is dangerous. Be careful out
there. Ugh, another problem to deal with...
Translation:
Ya veo. Kurumi es peligrosa. Ten cuidado ahí fuera.
Ugh, otro problema con el que lidiar...

Key: Sorry...

If you're able to seal her, I'd say this
might be a good opportunity for us...
Translation:
Si eres capaz de sellarla, diría que esta podría ser
Una buena oportunidad para nosotros...

Key: Considering last time... I'm sure it's easier said...
Translation:
Considerando la última vez... Estoy seguro de
Que es más fácil decirlo...

Key: Good point. Oh well.

So what about things on your end?
Were you able to find anything out?
Translation: ¿Y por tu parte? ¿Has podido averiguar algo?

Key:
Nothing. We had observed the Spirits' reaction
throughout Tengu City, but... that's all we know.
Translation:
Nada. Habíamos observado la reacción de los
Espíritus por toda Ciudad Tengu, pero…
Eso es todo lo que sabemos.

Key: Is there no way to look into it further?

We could've if it was possible, but we can't
get a hold of headquarters so there's nothing
we can really do.
Translation:
Podríamos haberlo hecho si fuera posible, pero no
podemos contactar con la sede,
Así que no podemos hacer nada.

Key:
We're in the middle of a big phenomenon though.
And I think Tengu City is in the center of this big
change. That's all I can say for sure.
Translation:
Pero estamos en medio de un gran fenómeno. Y creo que
Ciudad Tengu está en el centro de este gran cambio.
Eso es todo lo que puedo decir con seguridad.

Key: I see.
Don't give me that look.
But...

Shido, your job is to go on dates with Spirits and
stabilize them. If a girl dates a guy with the face
you're wearing, they'll only feel worse.
Translation:
Shido, tu trabajo es ir a citas con Espíritus y estabilizarlos.
Si una chica sale con un chico con la cara que llevas,
Solo se sentirán peor.

Key: Sorry. I looked that glum, huh?

Yeah, and it worries me. Shido, you need
to act normal or the Spirits won't feel at ease.
Translation:
Sí, y me preocupa. Shido, tienes que actuar con
Normalidad o los Espíritus no se sentirán a gusto.

Key: Okay...
Alright, I'll be borrowing your kitchen then.
Translation: De acuerdo, entonces tomaré prestada tu cocina.

Key: Yeah, sorry for the trouble all the time.
Translation: Sí, perdón por las molestias todo el tiempo.

Key:
Hee hee, you promised not to say that, right?
Next door neighbors help each other out, after all.
Translation:
Prometiste no decir eso, ¿verdad? Los vecinos de al lado
Se ayudan, después de todo.

Key:
Of course. If there's ever anything I can help with
at your house Rinne, you can always ask me.
Translation:
Por supuesto. Si alguna vez hay algo en lo que pueda
Ayudar en tu casa Rinne, siempre puedes pedírmelo.

Key: Thanks, Shido. But I don't think there's anything right now?
Translation: Gracias, Shido. Pero no creo que haya nada ahora mismo...

Key: It's true, you do have it together, Rinne...
Translation: Es verdad, lo tienes todo junto, Rinne...

Key: ...Is that so? I hope so...
Hm? What's wrong?
It's nothing. Alright then, I'll prepare things quickly.
Translation:
No es nada. Muy bien entonces,
Voy a preparar las cosas rápidamente.

Key: Alright, I'll be watching the pot on my end. I'll leave that side to you.
Translation:
De acuerdo, estaré vigilando la olla por mi parte.
Te dejaré ese lado a ti.

Key: Okay. Leave it to me.
Today's meal is meat and potato stew.
Translation: La comida de hoy es estofado de carne y patatas.

Key: Ohhh! This is quite the delicious smell!
Everyone's here, right? Then, let's eat!
Yes!  Let us eat!
Yeah! Time to eat!
L...Let's eat!
It's fluffy and delicious, Shido...!
You're right, this is definitely a motherly flavor.
Translation: Tienes razón, este es definitivamente un sabor maternal.

Key: Motherly flavor?
Umm...I guess you could say it means, a nostalgic sort of taste?
Translation:
Umm... Supongo que se podría decir que significa,
¿un tipo de sabor nostálgico?

Key: That's right. I wonder why, the taste is reassuring.
Translation: Así es. Me pregunto por qué, el sabor es tranquilizador.

Key:
Hmm. I see...
Then I must aim for a motherly taste when I cook!
Translation:
Hmm. Ya veo... ¡Entonces debo aspirar a un
Sabor maternal cuando cocine!

Key: Huh? You, cooking...?

Yes! I can do something like cooking too, Shido.
I make such things like cookies occasionally too...
Translation:
¡Sí! Yo también puedo hacer algo como cocinar, Shido.
Yo también hago cosas como galletas de vez en cuando...

Key: Oh, that's right. Sorry.
Oh, Tohka-chan, would you like seconds?
Yes Rinne, please!

Hee hee, you're welcome.
Don't rush too much and spill it.
Translation:
De nada.
No te apresures demasiado y derramarlo.

Key: Yes! Leave it to me!
Good grief...
